filter data by max and min Q Value threshold

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_TransitionCorrelations.R
filter_byQValue.Rd

employs parameters ident_qValue, qVal_minNumber_below_experiment_threshold, qVal_individual_threshold and qVal_experiment_threshold

filter_byQValue(pdata, config)

Examples

library(tidyverse)
dd <- prolfqua::spectronautDIAData250_A
config <- dd$config_f()
analysis <- dd$analysis(dd$data,config)

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases

summarize_hierarchy(analysis, config)

#> # A tibble: 50 x 5
#>    protein_Id        Isotope.Label_n peptide_Id_n modPeptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n
#>  * <chr>                       <int>        <int>           <int>          <int>
#>  1 A0A075B6I0                      1            1               1              1
#>  2 A0A075B6P5;P01615               1            3               5              7
#>  3 A0A075B6R2                      1            1               2              2
#>  4 A0A075B6S6;P06310               1            1               1              2
#>  5 A0A087WSY6;P01624               1            4               7              8
#>  6 A0A0B4J1V0                      1            6              11             13
#>  7 A0A0B4J1Z2                      1            1               1              1
#>  8 A0A0C4DH25                      1            9               9             11
#>  9 A0A0C4DH68                      1            2               2              2
#> 10 A0A0J9YXX1                      1            4               5              5
#> # ... with 40 more rows
res <- filter_byQValue(analysis, config)

#> Columns added : srm_QValueMin, srm_QValueNR
summarize_hierarchy(res, config)

#> # A tibble: 50 x 5
#>    protein_Id        Isotope.Label_n peptide_Id_n modPeptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n
#>  * <chr>                       <int>        <int>           <int>          <int>
#>  1 A0A075B6I0                      1            1               1              1
#>  2 A0A075B6P5;P01615               1            3               5              7
#>  3 A0A075B6R2                      1            1               2              2
#>  4 A0A075B6S6;P06310               1            1               1              2
#>  5 A0A087WSY6;P01624               1            4               7              8
#>  6 A0A0B4J1V0                      1            6              11             13
#>  7 A0A0B4J1Z2                      1            1               1              1
#>  8 A0A0C4DH25                      1            9               9             11
